channel.title: Null Problems - Solution Please?
channel.description: Ok, well there's a server i currently play on. Sometimes the server gets nulled. Is there a possible solution, code of some sort that you can enter into the client.java or one of those files that will stop allowing nulls to appear? It's for deltascape source. Please respond asap. Thank you.

item.title: Null Problems - Solution Please?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

So there are no type of files that can stop nulls from appearing?

We could use one right now >.>

Read full topic

item.title: Null Problems - Solution Please?
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

[quote=“boypipo, post:9, topic:251988”]na i know what he means,
the server can be all fine and the next thing you know, the server just spazzes out.
happend to me and i do got a dleta source to
its because u got some no life ppl who use either afg or another program to null ur server, i have a custome .class file that stoopps all , SYI,Nullers,and Afg :]

i cant upload it any wear but im sure some 1 will help u out =[/quote]
Wrong, you can log in by your self with your internet off for about 40 minutes and it will still do it, the server is junk… Why do you think it was released? It was released to show that these forums are 60% leecher’s and 40% actually try to accomplish their own work.

Read full topic

item.title: Null Problems - Solution Please?
item.dc:creator: @oron oron
item.description:
@oron wrote:

Are you on about as soon as you run the server it spams ‘Null’?

If you are then that’s anti-leech, put there on purpose to stop people like you using it lol. There is a fix of course for it but I’m not telling you how because that would just totally destroy the point of it.
